channel.title: = Trophy Gold - Tanigi = (Aug/Sep)
channel.description:
* Part of an ongoing series so enrolment in more than one session is preferred.
Tropes/Themes : Exploration, Fantasy Creatures, Investigation, Supernatural Magic.
The village of Tanigi lies where the mountain streams meet the forest. From Tanigi old cobblestone roads lead to ruins from a previous era, while overgrown trails lead deep into the woods. The village consists of a score of stone buildings and three dozen wooden cabins, linked by muddy roads and fenced in by a mediocre palisade.
= Exploration Zones = - Caves beneath Tanigi - Ruins in the hills - Woods north of Tanigi
= The game will be recorded on Youtube. = THE X-CARD will also be in use.
1 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MeSXbDmVObMbP-x4uuP 2 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MeSXsI1bEhc12_KieKo 3 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MeSYD1ma7X0ADgG-kR8 4 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MeSYtk7CBzH41KS6zEp 5 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MeSZ9b3CkfZZNO7Rr1o 6 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MeSZVown_155ZGVJTvV

  • Part of an ongoing series so enrolment in more than one session is preferred.

The village of Tanigi lies where the mountain streams meet the forest. From Tanigi old cobblestone roads lead to ruins from a previous era, while overgrown trails lead deep into the woods.
